description:
Garett is a very lean, sexy 20-year-old. He's currently single and working in the customer service industry. He told me that he's bisexual.
We have a collection of videos that we sometimes use to get guys "in the mood." When I showed him our collection, he took a liking to a tape featuring gay orgies. He confessed that he really likes the idea of group sex.
I experimented a little in this video with a new piece of equipment. It's a glass top held up by two supports. I put a camera underneath so you can really see the cum spurting out of his dick. I thought it worked pretty well!
title: Garett
